definitions.definition: A practice where a company uses its own products to test and promote the product's quality and reliability.
definitions.term_usage_example: By dogfooding their new app, the developers were able to identify bugs before it was released to the public.

definitions.definition: Una práctica donde una empresa utiliza sus propios productos para probar y promover la calidad y fiabilidad del producto.
definitions.expanded: Comer tu propia comida para perros
definitions.term_usage_example: Al practicar dogfooding con su nueva aplicación, los desarrolladores pudieron identificar errores antes de que se lanzara al público.
